testcase.name: OrderComponent should not have any items when opening the new component
OrderComponent should create the component
OrderComponent should show success if form is ok
OrderComponent should display total = 0 if no items are in the order
OrderComponent should show warning if customer is not selected
OrderComponent should generate a valid order number
OrderComponent should show warning if payment method is missing
OrderComponent should show warning if items is missing
OrderComponent should update total after adding an item
OrderItemsComponent should not submit the form when ItemID or Quantity is 0
OrderItemsComponent should submit the form when all fields are valid
OrderItemsComponent should initialize a new order
OrderItemsComponent should update totalPrice when selecting a quantity
OrderItemsComponent should create the component
OrderService should GET order by ID and return success
OrderService should GET order list and return success
OrderService should DELETE an order by ID and return success
OrderService should send a POST order and return success
AppComponent should render title
CustomerService should retrieve the customer list
OrdersComponent should create the component
OrdersComponent should navigate to /order/id when touched an order
OrdersComponent should load order list on init
OrdersComponent should show success if delete is confirmed
ItemService should retrieve the item list
